fulltext:
TRẦN QUANG CƯƠNG (CHARLIE) 
ABOUT ME 
I am a Marketing & Business data developer & analyst who specialized in developing 
Business Intelligence systems, Marketing & CRM Data Analytics systems and 
optimization processes. 
I have solid knowledge and experience in marketing (10 years) and business data (5 
years). The latest 
system I built (mainly by myself) is the Business Intelligence System which integrate 
Facebook Ads, 
Google Ads and other advertising platforms data with my company CRM to generate 
meaningful and 
actionable reports in different levels. 
I am familiar with Facebook Marketing API, Google Ads API and other advertising 
platforms. Besides, I have knowledge and experience with: 
- ETL software (Pentaho, Talend, Stitchdata, Singer.io, etc) and been using them for my 
job. 
- Different database management systems: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Hadoop 
and the others 
- Data mining & visualizer: Metabase, Re:dash, KNIME, Tableau, Looker, Sisense, Power 
BI, Qlik, etc 
- Programming & analytical languages: R, Python, SQL, Javacript, Linux 
- Web & app analytics tools: Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, Facebook Offline 
Conversion, Mixpanel (for apps), Google Tag Manager, Matomo, etc. 
- Marketing automation systems 
- Marketing technologies, practices, strategies and activities 
WORK HISTORY 
Trainer for Topica Edu – Social 
Media Course  
Teacher at FPT University - 
Marketing data analytics Course 
EDUCA CORPORATION 
NOV 2018 – MAY 2019 
MARKETING MANAGER 
- Plan and deploy the Business Intelligence System, focusing on Marketing – 
Sales Optimization purposes 
- Consult the BOM on data structure and data enrichment processes 
- Supervise & optimize data flows 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
- Successfully integrate Facebook Marketing API, Google Ads API, Google 
Analytics and other advertising platforms’ APIs with CRM to create 
different levels of performance reports 
(account, campaign, ads, ad contents, landing pages, keywords with ROAs, 
ROI) 
AQUOZ SOLUTIONS 
NOV 2016 – JAN 2018 
MARKETING MANAGER 
- Develop Marketing strategy & management system 
- Setup new performance tracking & analytics system which integrated all 
advertising platforms and CRM. 
- Develop user behaviors descriptive & predictive reports 
- Supervise daily activities 
- Report Business results to higher Management on daily basis 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
- Marketing strategy which emphasizes mobile user acquisition 
- Successfully integrate new anonymous payment methods 
- Monthly active users increase 15% - 20% each month after optimized 
- Conversion rate (registration/traffic sessions) increases 100% - 200% each 
month 
- Reduce the season effect during the last low season 
- Increase monthly affiliate registration up to 200% 
PEACESOFT GROUP 
MAR 2015 – OCT 2016 
PRODUCT & MARKETING MANAGER @NGÂN LƯỢNG DIGITAL PAYMENT – 
PEACESOFT GROUP   Mar 2015 – Oct 2016 
- Develop Marketing & Sales strategies 
- Analyze & develop new version of Ngân Lượng 
- Develop new digital payment tools which applied cutting-edge technologies in 
the world 
- Co-operate with Banks & Payment card brands (Visa, Mastercard, JCB) to 
deliver discount campaigns to merchants & buyers 
- Supervise daily activities 
- Report Business results to higher Management on monthly basis 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
- Marketing & Sales 6-month plan 
- Ngân Lượng’s new frontend 
- New payment tool for Games & Digital Content (Interactive mockups, 
Process Flowcharts & Detailed technical requirements) 
- New E-commerce Advanced Payment tool (Interactive mockups, Process 
Flowcharts & Detailed technical requirements) 
COUNTRY MANAGER @WESHOP VIỆT NAM – PEACESOFT GROUP 
Mar 2015 – Sep 2015 
- Develop Marketing, Sales and Operation strategies 
- Build tracking & reporting system (Marketing, CRM & Operation 
Management) 
- Supervised daily activities 
- Report Business results to higher Management on monthly basis 
- Consult Weshop Indonesia & Malaysia on Marketing & Sales 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
- Revenue growth rate was more than 70% - 6 months in a row 
- Marketing & Sales plans are proven effective 
- Designed the UX of the new Operation Management system 
                         TOPICA EDTECH GROUP             FEB 2014 – MAR 2015 
MANAGEMENT TRAINER @TOPICA NATIVE THAILAND – TOPICA EDTECH GROUP 
Nov 2014 – Mar 2015 
- Operation management trainer 
- Back - office supporter (Legal issues, Logistics, Partners, etc.) 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
- Successfully trained 2 Operation staffs who can monitor 5 online classes at 
the same time, 10 hours of monitoring every day. 
- New Operation procedure to merge Thailand classes with Vietnam classes, 
which reduced half of operation cost 
- Detailed reports on Thailand Business laws, suggestion of practical business 
forms, lists of partners, top suitable business locations, etc. 
HEAD OF SOCIAL MEDIA @TOPICA PHILIPPINES - TOPICA EDTECH GROUP 
June 2014 – Nov 2014 
- Developed Content & Branding plans 
- Analyzed Philippines Online Education market segments 
- Developed Marketing & Sales budget plans 
- Report Marketing results to higher Management on monthly basis 
- Supervised daily activities 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
- The Philippines market analysis: Education, Labor, Internet usage, 
Online marketing activities 
- Marketing budget plans 
- The official site of AMA - TOPICA Programs 
FINANCIAL ANALYST @IBM VIỆT NAM 
May 2011 - Nov 2011 
- Reviewed new contracts regarding to budget details 
- Reported weekly budget & cash flow of existing projects 
- Adjusted projects' budget allocations according to Project Managers' 
feedbacks 
SKILLS 
- Marketing APIs: Facebook, Google, Ad networks 
- ETL softwares (Pentaho, Talend, Stitchdata, Singer.io, etc) and been using 
them for my job. 
- CRM, ERP, Ad servers 
-- ETL software (Pentaho, Talend, Stitchdata, Singer.io, etc) and been using 
them for my job. 
- Different database management systems: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, 
Hadoop and the others 
- Data mining & visualizer: Metabase, Re:dash, KNIME, Tableau, Looker, 
Sisense, Power BI, Qlik, etc 
- Programming & analytical languages: R, Python, SQL, Javacript, Linux 
- Web & app analytics tools: Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, Facebook 
Offline Conversion, Mixpanel (for apps), Google Tag Manager, Matomo, 
etc. 
- Marketing automation systems 
- Marketing technologies, practices, strategies and activities 
- Data mining & visualizer: Metabase, Re:dash, KNIME, Tableau 
- Programming & analytical languages: R, Python, SQL, Javacript, Linux 
- Tracking systems: Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, Facebook Offline 
Conversion, Mixpanel (for apps), Google Tag Manager, Matomo, etc. 
- Marketing automation systems 
- Marketing technologies, practices, strategies and activities 
EDUCATION 
BACHELOR OF FINANCE & BANKING @HÀ NỘI UNIVERSITY
